ComicInfo.Title: A True Story; House of Raging Women; Love Bites; Sixto the Dinosaur
ComicInfo.Summary:
A True Story: How the wrestler Keith Franks, later on known as Adrian Adonis came to the artist's attention, including a close encounter he had with him before a gig.
House of Raging Women: Rena has unretired and is back in the wrestling ring, more vicious than ever, angling for a shot at Vicki Glori's title. Vicki tells a disbelieving Maggie that Rena lied to her, that the reason their rematch never happened was because Rena was pregnant. Rena courts her friends as she secretly awaits her son Antonio's arrival later, but he doesn't show up because Mrs. Minder the legal guardian disapproves of her activities in the ring.
Love Bites: Carmen gets mad at Heraclio and kicks him out of the house for embarrassing her by defending Luba.
Sixto the Dinosaur: Sixto runs away from a larger dinosaur only to come in contact with a gigantic one.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-30 20:29:44. [CVDB95750] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 21:58:26. [Issue ID 212402]
